greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: First differences of A261093; characteristic function for A219640.
comment: a(n) = number of ways to express n as a sum of nonzero terms of A000071 in such a way that no term is used twice, and no two consecutive terms are used at the same time. For 0 we have one solution, an empty sum, thus a(0) = 1.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..6765
xref: Cf. also A079559, A230412 (analogous sequences for other bases), A000071.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 08 2015
